category_id.description: Get the blok ID (_uid) from the relevant category found on the /[language code]/[Site settings] story. E.g. "1935f224-0a04-40b1-99e0-205353e392b2"

use_main_signup_destination.description: Main Signup Destination is defined on the Global Settings. If this option is TRUE, it will override any link attribute defined on this button

frontpage_link_label.description: Shown on checkout pages as the only link to navigate away from page.

main_signup_destination.description: Used as a general option, when we sprinkle CTA buttons around the site. Point to "Main Signup Destination"

watch_mesterlaere_label.description: Label on the primary button to start watching a Mesterl√¶re

global_production_blocks.description: Contents we show below productions contents on each production page.

become_member_label.description: Multiple places in the contents (e.g. on a Production page), we show a "Become member" button to visitors without membership. What should the label of that button be?

become_member_link.description: Multiple places in the contents (e.g. on a Production page), we show a "Become member" button to visitors without membership. Where should we send those?

signup_already_member.description: [ACTION] will be replaced with a localised version of "sign in" that is a link to allow the user to sign in

image.description: NB: Only used, if no video is selected
NB: Only used, if no video is selected

product_id.description: Be careful with this. Has to be a real product id for a real one-time product

is_checkout.description: If true, the page will hide Footer and show a trimmed version of the Header

show_without_coupon_match.description: When true, this product will be showcased. If false, it will only be available if the user keys in a coupon code that pays for the product

special_combo.default_value: Only use, if you want to override the normal price of this subscription. The price will also be used when the subscription is automatically renewed.

get_started_bloks.description: What to show to user, when they have signed up successfully

planned_release_date.description: If this is in the future, the "Coming soon" label will be added to the production

stripe_price_id.description: Be careful with this. Has to be a real priceId from a real subscription product
stripe_price_id.display_name: Stripe Price ID (OBSOLETE NOT IN USE)

stripe_price_id_test.display_name: Stripe Price ID Test (OBSOLETE NOT IN USE)

trial_period_override_code.display_name: Trial Period Override (OBSOLETE NOT IN USE)

coupon_codes.description: a single coupon code to automatically be added to the checkout. If user inputs their own code on form, they will both be attached to checkout

options.name: Convert in web app with same headline
Convert in website form  (OBSOLETE NOT IN USE)

video.description: Leave blank, to use image instead

image.description: Only used, when there is no video
